shows.title: Listening While Muslim: A Transglobal Sonic Soul Celebration!
shows.desc:
A listening party like nothing you’ve heard before. Abdul-Rehman Malik and Asad Ali Jafri take us on a sonic soul journey that crosses continents, languages and genres. Join us as the worlds of jazz, hip hop, qawwali and the blues collide.

Abdul-Rehman Malik is an award-winning journalist, educator and cultural organiser whose work creates platforms where arts and social change meet.

Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme

shows.title: The Hot House Chills
shows.desc:
The Hot House is where discussion meets the dancefloor. So every evening, the space will transform itself into an indoor-outdoor space full of great ambient tunes and complete with a pop-up bar and night-time lighting and art installations, courtesy of Creative Giants. Join us as we celebrate the beauty of our festival site and dance under the stretch or stars ’til late each night.

Your Greenbelt DJs for the night will be Asad Ali Jafri and Paul Cooper
